ai.summary: A short, easy 1.5 km loop hike starting and ending near Hayes Station in the United Kingdom. Ideal for beginners and casual walkers, with gentle terrain and a quick outdoor escape.
ai.terrain_summary: Gentle, mostly flat to mildly undulating trails through urban greenspace and parkland. Expect well-maintained gravel, dirt, and some paved sections with occasional grassy stretches. Watch for other walkers and cyclists near crossings.
ai.safety_notes: Plan for daylight and weather; stay on established paths; remain aware of pedestrian and cyclist traffic at busy sections; cross streets safely and use crossings; carry a light or phone for navigation; bring basic first aid and water.
ai.best_seasons: Spring to Autumn; feasible year-round with proper clothing and daylight considerations.

seo.title: Easy 1.5 km Loop Hike from Hayes Station, UK
seo.meta_description: Discover a short, easy 1.5 km loop starting and ending at Hayes Station in the United Kingdom. Gentle terrain, beginner-friendly, with practical safety tips and gear.
